featured.text: In 1931, members of the Rotary Clubs of Alberta and Montana suggested joining the two parks as a symbol of peace and friendship between the two countries.

definition.zh_def: 友誼是兩人或多人的情感聯繫，通常基於相互的喜愛、支持和理解。
definition.en_def: Friendship is a mutual bond between two or more people, typically characterized by affection, support, and understanding.
definition.example: Their friendship has lasted for over a decade.
